bug.cf_doc_type: If docs needed, set a value

long_desc.thetext:
Description of problem:
Perform regular dnf upgrade Some issues found related to qt, re-run a few times to refresh dnf metadata, but still the same issue
[boucaron@boucaron-i7 gui]$ sudo dnf upgrade --refresh google-webdesigner 12 kB/s | 1.8 kB 00:00 google-chrome 21 kB/s | 3.7 kB 00:00 google-talkplugin 17 kB/s | 2.6 kB 00:00 Dependencies resolved. ================================================================================ Package Arch Version Repository Size ================================================================================ Skipping packages with broken dependencies: qt5-qtdeclarative x86_64 5.7.1-4.fc25 updates 3.0 M qt5-qtdeclarative-devel x86_64 5.7.1-4.fc25 updates 733 k qt5-qtwebkit x86_64 5.7.1-2.fc25 updates 10 M qt5-qtwebkit-devel x86_64 5.7.1-2.fc25 updates 62 k
Transaction Summary ================================================================================ Skip 4 Packages
Nothing to do. Complete! [boucaron@boucaron-i7 gui]$ designer-qt5 Cannot mix incompatible Qt library (version 0x50700) with this library (version 0x50701) Aborted (core dumped)
[boucaron@boucaron-i7 gui]$ sudo rpm -qa | grep designer [sudo] password for boucaron: qt5-qttools-libs-designercomponents-5.7.1-4.fc25.x86_64 qt5-qttools-libs-designer-5.7.1-4.fc25.x86_64 qt5-designer-5.7.1-4.fc25.x86_64
Version-Release number of selected component (if applicable):
How reproducible:
Steps to Reproduce: 1. 2. 3.
Actual results:
Expected results:
Additional info:
qt5-qtdeclarative-5.7.1-5.fc25 has been submitted as an update to Fedora 25. https://bodhi.fedoraproject.org/updates/FEDORA-2016-4d46b8cf07
qt5-qtdeclarative-5.7.1-5.fc25 has been pushed to the Fedora 25 stable repository. If problems still persist, please make note of it in this bug report.
